name: Ritchie Tiongson
text: In general, PvE multiplayer is much less toxic. My experiences with Battleborn and ME3 PvE were quite pleasant. Still a chance of toxicity in large groups, like MMO raids.

source_obj.text: In general, PvE multiplayer is much less toxic. My experiences with Battleborn and ME3 PvE were quite pleasant. Still a chance of toxicity in large groups, like MMO raids.
